Title: The Book of Job
Writer: Jonathan Tropper (created by), David Schickler (created by), Liz Sagal, Liz Sagal (supervising story producer)
Actors: Antony Starr, Ivana Milicevic, Ulrich Thomsen, Frankie Faison
Plot: Job is being tortured. With help of Fat Au, Carrie and Hood find the man who took Job from the camp. Kurt and Maggie continue their relationship. The Bowman request their daughter's body. Brock makes an arrest in the Bowman case.
